title: Ironman Triathlon, Golf, or TV Dancing? Geraint Thomas Confirms 2025 Retirement, Plans for Future
content:
'I didn't want to do one year too many and be the grumpy guy in the team': Former Tour de France champion confirms he'll hang up his wheels this September.

Read the full article at Ironman Triathlon, Golf, or TV Dancing? Geraint Thomas Confirms 2025 Retirement, Plans for Future on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
